summary: TWICE WHILE DRIVING AT 65MPH THE ENGINE CONTROL FUSE HAS BLOWN SHUTTING DOWN THE ENGINE AND CAUSING THE POWER STEERING AND ABS BRAKING TO ALSO QUIT.  FORTUNATELY, WE WERE DRIVING ON A STRAIGHT ROAD.  COULD CAUSE A BIG PROBLEM IN BAD WEATHER AND CURVY ROADS.  HAVE SEEN THAT THERE IS ANOTHER SIMILIAR INCIDENT IN YOUR COMPLAINT FILES FROM THE SAME MAKE AND MODEL
